article.title: Apptis Receives Contract to Provide Information Assurance Support to U.S. Central Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Apptis Incorporated has won a $25 million contract to provide critical network operations and information assurance support to the U.S. Central Command in Bahrain and at MacDill Air Force Base, Tampa, Florida. Under the Defense Information Systems Agency task order, Apptis will supply network operations and help-desk support to the command and control communications systems available to troops in combat zones.
